alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Dyer; Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 6:51PM CST until January 28 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Tennessee... South Fork of the Forked Deer River near Halls For the South Fork Forked Deer River...including Jackson, Halls... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork of the Forked Deer River near Halls. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Farmland near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Saturday the stage was 9.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:00 PM CST Saturday was 9.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 8.0 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued Sunday afternoon at 400 PM CST.
